LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_EnableCompression_Toolt: Use compressed event text to reduce token usage when sending quests and events to RimTalk.
LanguageData.RimTalkEventPlus_Compression_Description:
When enabled, Event+ will compress long, repetitive quest descriptions while keeping key facts.
Example (refugee hospitality quest): - Before: A long multi-paragraph letter explaining who the refugees are, why they fled, how long they will stay, and that they will work and fight for free... - After: A short summary like: "The colony accepted the refugees. They fled for [reason], will stay for X days to rest, and will work and fight for free during that time."
When disabled, Event+ always sends the full original event text.
